§ 718. Repealed. Aug. 4, 1949, ch. 393, § 20, 63 Stat. 561
Section, act Feb. 26, 1907, ch. 1638, § 6, 34 Stat. 997, related to traveling expenses of Army and Navy officers.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective first day of third month after approval by President [Aug. 4, 1949], see section 19 of act Aug. 4, 1949, set out as an Effective Date note preceding chapter 1 of Title 14, Coast Guard.
